name: Lucid Academy – Trivia
description:
No ads
No in-app purchases
Works offline
Varying topics and increasing difficulty
Ambient music

If you enjoy learning and answering trivia questions, Lucid Academy - Trivia is the right app for you.

This app is suited for all ages and the content is presented with varying topics and increasing difficulty in five categories: Newbie, Starter, Intermediate, Advanced and Expert with five levels in each category. There are questions about arts, animals, biology, chemistry, earth, food, geography, history, music, math, matter, nature, physics, technology, space, plants, water, weather, sports, and more.

It is strongly recommended to start with the Newbie category and work all the way up to the next category. In each category, you will have three chances to answer the question. To advance to the next level in each category, you will need to score as follows:

Newbie to Starter category 6000 points

Starter to Intermediate category 12000 points

Intermediate to Advanced category 18000 points

Expert category 24000 of the questions

You can see your score any time by answering the questions or by clicking the scoreboard icon that captures and shows your overall score.

Ambient background music makes for a pleasant experience that can be turned off anytime.
